description:
Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro’s sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10 Oku no Otoko: Saikyou no 3 Shousei Katakuri
10億の男 最強の3将星カタクリ
Ein Kopfgeld von über einer Milliarde! – Katakuri, der stärkste Sweet General!
L`homme qui valait un milliard. Katakuri, le plus fort des généraux sucrés !
The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!
Человек с наградой в миллиард! Сильнейший Конфентный генерал, Катакури!
